definition: A group of individuals assembled for the purpose of collaborating on a specific task or assignment, typically within the context of a work or academic project. This term commonly refers to a team that is formed to collectively work towards achieving a shared objective, often involving planning, coordination, and implementation of various project-related activities.

examples.german: Das Projektteam arbeitet eng zusammen, um das Projekt erfolgreich abzuschließen.
examples.english: The project team works closely together to successfully complete the project.

examples.german: Unser Projektteam besteht aus Experten verschiedener Fachbereiche.
examples.english: Our project team consists of experts from various fields.

examples.german: Das Projektteam trifft sich regelmäßig, um den Fortschritt zu besprechen.
examples.english: The project team meets regularly to discuss the progress.

examples.german: Das Projektteam ist verantwortlich für die Planung und Umsetzung des Projekts.
examples.english: The project team is responsible for the planning and implementation of the project.

examples.german: Das Projektteam arbeitet unter Zeitdruck, um die Deadline einzuhalten.
examples.english: The project team is working under time pressure to meet the deadline.
